hero.title: Institute for Community Building and Empowerment (ICBE)
hero.subtitle: Empowering Communities, Advancing Equity, Building Resilience.

about.introduction: The Institute for Community Building and Empowerment (ICBE) is a non-profit, community-driven organization founded by Humaira Shaheen with a mission to serve individuals and communities across Balochistan without discrimination based on geography, gender, identity, or background. ICBE was established to bridge the gap between potential and opportunity by creating inclusive platforms that nurture ethical leadership, strengthen communities, and promote sustainable development. Our foundational belief is: no one left behind.
about.vision: To build a just, resilient, and empowered Balochistan where every individual - regardless of location, identity, or circumstance - has access to support, dignity, and the opportunity to thrive.
about.mission: ICBE is dedicated to serving all communities and individuals across Balochistan by providing timely, inclusive, and needs-based interventions. We empower people through climate resilience efforts, GBV prevention and response, youth engagement, mental health programs, and holistic community development, ensuring no voice is unheard and no need is overlooked.
objectives: Develop leadership competencies among emerging and established leaders.
Promote inclusive leadership across youth, adults, and elders.
Strengthen community institutions through participatory governance.
Provide mentorship and networking opportunities for change makers.
Conduct research and advocacy on empowerment and sustainability.
Build partnerships with local, national, and international organizations.
Establish mobile outreach systems for underserved and disaster-affected communities.

coreValues.title: Inclusive
coreValues.description: We serve every community with fairness, dignity, and equal respect.

coreValues.title: Community-Driven
coreValues.description: We design and deliver programs with communities, not for them.

coreValues.title: Survivor-Centered
coreValues.description: We prioritize safety, confidentiality, and agency in every support pathway.

coreValues.title: Evidence-Informed
coreValues.description: We use data, local learning, and research to shape effective action.

coreValues.title: Sustainable
coreValues.description: We connect short-term support with long-term systems strengthening.

coreValues.title: Equity-Focused
coreValues.description: We address structural barriers so no one is left behind.

timeline.title: Listening First
timeline.description: Understanding community needs through dialogue and trust-building.

timeline.title: Co-Creation
timeline.description: Designing programs with communities to ensure relevance and ownership.

timeline.title: Capacity Building
timeline.description: Strengthening skills, institutions, and local systems for resilience.

timeline.title: Sustainable Solutions
timeline.description: Integrating immediate relief with long-term development pathways.

timeline.title: Partnership and Collaboration
timeline.description: Working with stakeholders to scale impact across Balochistan.

timeline.title: Collective Progress
timeline.description: Every outreach visit, training, and partnership advances dignity and justice.

services.title: Climate Resilience and Emergency Response
services.description: ICBE strengthens climate resilience and emergency response in remote and underserved areas through preparedness, adaptation awareness, community training, and mobile emergency outreach.
services.impactFocus: Equipping communities to anticipate, respond to, and recover from climate-related crises.

services.title: Mental Health and Psychosocial Support
services.description: ICBE provides individual and group counseling rooted in trauma-informed care, with focused support for survivors of violence, adolescents, and frontline workers.
services.impactFocus: Reducing stigma and strengthening community-based mental health support systems.

services.title: GBV and SEA Prevention
services.description: ICBE prevents gender-based violence and sexual exploitation and abuse through survivor-centered services, case management capacity building, district awareness campaigns, and safe referral pathways.
services.impactFocus: Protecting safety, dignity, and access to support for survivors.

services.title: Youth Leadership and Empowerment
services.description: ICBE develops confident and capable young leaders through leadership training, digital literacy, peacebuilding initiatives, and social entrepreneurship mentorship.
services.impactFocus: Training 5,000 youth leaders by 2030 to lead change in their communities.

services.title: Community Development and Governance
services.description: ICBE promotes participatory governance, intergenerational dialogue, and stronger local institutions to build accountable, transparent, and resilient community systems.
services.impactFocus: Supporting communities to lead inclusive and sustainable local development.
